After a successful Black Friday week selling higher memory machines, we have some stock for some smaller specifications. The following offers are for manual provision only and come in a bundle. Upon ordering you will receive three machines with the below specifications. 

Datacenter Location: North Carolina, United States

Pick up a 3 X 256MB Bundle - $30.00/Year OR  3 X 512MB Bundle - $36.00/YR

**Here's what you get:**

* Three KVM Machines
* Dedicated IPv4
* IPv6 Available
* 256-512MB RAM 
* 10GB HDD Storage 
* 1 vCore E5 CPU 
* 100GB Bandwidth 

<a href="https://ho-ost.com/cart.php?gid=8">Order Your Bundle @ Ho-ost</a>
